price: As for those who disbelieve, how wretched will be their state! And He will render their deeds void.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَتَعۡسٗا لَّهُمۡ وَأَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
